title: Capstone
content: Can capstone projects  team  include ppl from different branches.?

comments.body: yes, but you need approval from chairpersons
Is it difficult to do that?
There are a few hurdles to jump over that's why people don't recommend it.
They will accept ur request if your problem statement has smtg related to your branch like some concept,my friend his team has 1 EEE 1 ECE 2 CS  so it's possible but need to satisfy those conditions.
Not advised unless you're not doing a Capstone from your branch.
